name: Senior Network Engineer/Solution Architect (Mobile Core Subject Metter Expert)
description:
Since 1993, Netcracker Technology has been developing and implementing unique IT solutions for more than 250 customers worldwide, mostly telecom providers. We create dozens of innovative products and lead the global market of BSS/OSS solutions ready to be used in the cloud environment. Our comprehensive portfolio of software solutions and professional services enables large-scale digital transformations, unlocking the cloud's opportunities, virtualization, and the changing mobile ecosystem.

We are currently looking for a Senior Network Engineer/Solution Architect (Mobile Core Subject Metter Expert)

Why join our team:

  • Work on design, development, and customization of mission-critical solutions to world-leading telecom companies
  • Implement and support innovative technologies such as 5G, eSIM, Internet access by satellites in low Earth orbit, IoT, etc.
  • Get unlimited opportunities for professional and career development in a global company

What you’ll do:

  • Development of Network Design Proposal for 5G NSA/SA Core with Core Vendors as part of POC (proof of concepts), trials and commercial deployments;
  • Participating in R&D and Delivery Projects of 5G NSA and SA Mobile Core Automation Solutions (Slicing, Provisioning, FCAPS,):
    • Network Design Development for Lab/Pilot trials
    • Network Test Plan Review/Creation for Lab/Pilot trials
    • Network Prerequisite and Tests in Lab/Pilot
    • Participate in NSA/SA Mobile Core Automation Solutions design and delivery as SME
  • Consulting and Work with Solution Architects to support pre-sale and delivery processes of NSA/SA Mobile Core Automation Solution: Provisioning, Slicing, FCAPS for UPF, SMF, AMF, NRF, NSSF, N3IWF, Voice over NR, xHaul for 5G/4G, Edge DC/PaaS/Cloud/k8s
  • Preparation of technical part of response to RFPs and RFIs
  • Analyze gaps of current solutions versus customer requirements;
  • Development of Solution demonstration scenarios, presentations, PoC specifications and acceptance criteria;
  • Configuration and demonstration to prospective customers of 5G NSA/SA Network Automation Solution to support sales opportunity process and delivery projects
  • Translation of 5G NSA/SA Core network design to system analysts from solution development and onboarding/modeling teams;

What we are looking for:

Must have

  • Deep knowledge of existing mobile core network technology and architecture, principals and services, including but not limited to AMF/UPF/SMF, EPC/MME/PGW; SGSN/GGSN; PCRF; HSS, DRA, DPI/TDF; Non-3GPP access techniques (trusted/non-trusted),
  • VoLTE/IMS architecture;
  • Deep Knowledge of traditional network equipment and related NMS/EMS and new containerized/virtualized network functions and network automation approaches

Nice to have

  • SDN/NFV concepts and architectures;
  • OpenStack, Kubernetes (internal architecture, administration principles, deployment, operation and maintenance);
  • Linux networking stack, SR-IOV, DPDK;
  • Understanding of basic and advanced networking concepts (VLANs, OpenVPN, iptables, dnsmasq, tunneling, overlay networking, layer 4-7 services, etc.);
  • Understanding of container based networking in public and private clouds (benefits, technologies, options, key suppliers, use cases, etc.);
  • Familiarity with technologies like Open VSwitch, OpenFlow, OpenStack, AWS, etc.;
  • Familiarity with networking protocols (TCP/IP, Ethernet, 802.1Q, GRE, VXLAN, L2VPN, MPLS, BGP, IS-IS, Segment Routing, Radio over Ethernet, etc);
  • Specific knowledge in Mobile (4G, 3G, 2G) and Fixed networks (network architectures, service models, service provisioning);
  • Demonstrated knowledge of major industry standards: 3GPP, ORAN alliance, TMF, TNM, ETSI, ITU, ONF, etc.

Common Requirements:

  • Strong understanding of telecom technologies, industry trends (network architectures, technologies, services) used in wireline, wireless, cable operators;
  • 5+ years working as mobile network engineer in Telco/Vendor;
  • IMS and/or EPC of any vendor hands-on experience
  • Hands on experience in Telco business processes related to BSS and OSS operations;
  • Experience in NFV/SDN/5G area would be a plus;
  • University degree;
  • Fluent English.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • Medical insurance, covering dental services and online consultations with doctors
  • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center
  • Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture
  • Free English courses and opportunity to practice foreign languages daily
  • Flexible working hours and an opportunity to work remotely.
